articles.title: Unmukt Chand To Be First Indian Male To Play In Australia's T20 Big Bash League - NDTVSports.com
articles.description: Unmukt Chand is set to be the first Indian male cricketer to play in Australia's Big Bash League after the batter signed for the 2021-2022 season which begins from next month.
